resources.string: Choose what you\'d like to say:
Create a new conversation from selected template
OR remove an existing sentence from chat

Each chat is made up of elements. When you edit or create a chat you will be shown each element in either green or red boxes. The colours flag whether an element has at least one sentence assigned to it or not (green for former, red for latter). 
 Click on the element to enter the configuration screen. 
 Select each element in turn from the drop down and add one or more sentences/phrases for it. 
For Child turns they will be able to choose from a list of these and for the Agent turns one will be chosen at random. 
All sentences are added to the sentence bank (making them available to choose for similar elements in future) as well as the chat if they don't already exist. You can remove from the sentence bank or just the chat using the - buttons.
Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
Enter supervising adult\'s name/title (e.g. Mum, Mrs Jones)
Enter a phrase to praise a perfect conversation
Enter reward to be won after 50 perfect conversations
